Column.name: CovertAgentRankRateChange
Column.notes: Discount to the number of operations a covert agent needs to level up

Column.name: MiasmaDamageMod
Column.notes: Percent modifier to miasma damage for all units

Column.name: MiasmaBaseHeal
Column.notes: Base heal change for all units in miasma (negates any miasma damage effects)

Column.name: MiasmaPlotYieldImmunity
Column.notes: Negates the negative effects of Miasma on plot yields

Column.name: UnitFlatHealChange
Column.notes: Flat heal change for all units in any circumstance

Column.name: UnitFlatVisibilityChange
Column.notes: Flat visibility range change for all units in any circumstance

Column.name: UnitPercentHealChange
Column.notes: Percent heal change for all units in any circumstance

Column.name: NavalMovementChange
Column.notes: Flat change to movement range of all naval units

Column.name: ExpeditionSpeedMod
Column.notes: Flat change to the completion speed of Explorer Expedition actions

Column.name: WorkerSpeedMod
Column.notes: Flat change to the work speed of all Worker units

Column.name: DiploCapitalPurchaseCostMod
Column.notes: Percent modifier for purchasing things in the production menu with capital.

Column.name: AgreementDiploPurchaseCapitalCostMod
Column.notes: Percent modifier to the flat cost of purchasing a foreign policy in a diplomatic agreement

Column.name: AgreementDiploPerTurnCapitalCostMod
Column.notes: Percent modifier to the per-turn cost of a foreign policy in an agreement

Column.name: OrbitalCoverageChange
Column.notes: Flat change to the orbital coverage for all cities

Column.name: OrbitalStrikeRangeChange
Column.notes: Flat change to the anti-orbital strike range for all cities

Column.name: OutpostOrbitalCoverageChange
Column.notes: Flat change to the orbital coverage for all outposts

Column.name: OrbitalCoverageCombatMod
Column.notes: Percent change to unit combat strength when fighting inside friendly orbital coverage

Column.name: OrbitalProductionModPerLaunchedUnit
Column.notes: Rolling cumulative production cost mod for each orbital unit launched

Column.name: OrbitalResourceCostChange
Column.notes: Flat change to resource quantities required to build orbital units

Column.name: StationOrbitalCoverageChange
Column.notes: Flat change to the orbital coverage for all actively-trading stations

Column.name: GrowthCarryover
Column.notes: Food carryover after city growth for all cities

Column.name: AlienOpinionRecoveryMod
Column.notes: Percent change to aliens' opinion recovering towards neutral every turn

Column.name: AlienOpinionFriendlyInfluence
Column.notes: Points applied each turn to the Aliens' positive opinion of the player

Column.name: AlienCombatMod
Column.notes: Percent change to unit combat strength when fighting aliens

Column.name: ExplorerExpeditionCharges
Column.notes: Flat change to the number of Expedition Charges player's Explorer units have (affects existing units)

Column.name: RouteMaintenanceMod
Column.notes: Percent change to energy maintenance for routes (road and magrail)

Column.name: TradeUnitsImmuneToAliens
Column.notes: Makes Trade Units non-targetable by Alien units

Column.name: TradeUnitsImmuneToMiasma
Column.notes: Makes Trade Units able to path Trade Routes through Miasma

Column.name: ExplorerUnitsImmuneToAliens
Column.notes: Makes Explorer Units non-targetable by Alien units

Column.name: FreeSpies
Column.notes: Player receives one-time additional covert agent slots when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreeVirtue
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time Free Virtue when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreeTech
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time Free Tech when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreePopulation
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time population increase in each city when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreeEnergy
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time grant of Energy when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreeCulture
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time grant of Culture when the perk is applied

Column.name: FreeScience
Column.notes: Player receives a one-time grant of Science when the perk is applied

Column.name: CityStartingFreeUnitClass
Column.notes: Newly founded cities receive a free unit of this class

Column.name: CityEnergyPurchaseCostMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the Energy cost of rush-build purchases in all Cities

Column.name: ExtraCityProcessYield
Column.notes: Flat change to the yield return rate from City Production Processes

Column.name: CityProcessYieldMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the overall yield return rate from City Production Processes

Column.name: InvaderAttritionChange
Column.notes: Flat change to damage dealt to hostile units inside the Player's borders each turn

Column.name: CovertOpsIntriguePrereqChange
Column.notes: Change the Intrigue level required to attempt a given covert op

Column.name: CultureBuildingCostMod
Column.notes: Percent change to production cost to build city buildings that yield Culture

Column.name: GlobalEnergyIncomePercentScienceYield
Column.notes: Science yield gained each turn based on a percentage of global Energy income

Column.name: GlobalEnergyIncomePercentCultureYield
Column.notes: Culture yield gained each turn based on a percentage of global Energy income

Column.name: GlobalEnergyYieldPerOwnedPlot
Column.notes: Energy yield gained each turn from the number of plots in the player's territory

Column.name: GlobalEnergyYieldFromReserves
Column.notes: Energy yield gained each turn based on the player's Energy reserve (stockpile)

Column.name: TradeRouteStrategicResourceChange
Column.notes: Flat change to the quantity of strategic resources exchanged via int'l trade routes

Column.name: TradeRoutePlunderYieldMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the yield gained from plundering a Trade Route

Column.name: InternationalTradeRouteYieldMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the value of all yields received from International city routes

Column.name: InternalTradeRouteYieldMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the value of all yields received from Internal city routes

Column.name: StationTradeRouteYieldMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the value of all yields received from Station routes

Column.name: PositiveHealthLevelsStrengthModifier
Column.notes: Increases the effect strength of positive Health by this percentage

Column.name: NegativeHealthLevelsStrengthModifier
Column.notes: Decreases the effect strength of negative Health by this percentage

Column.name: AllowUnitsFullHealInCities
Column.notes: Special ability: Damaged units heal to full in one turn if fortified in a city

Column.name: AllowSpecialstsFreeFood
Column.notes: Specialist city citizens require no food to maintain

Column.name: FirstCityWonderFree
Column.notes: First Wonder built in any city costs no Production

Column.name: CovertOpsSciencePerAgentRank
Column.notes: Free science per rank level of the agent after a successful covert operation

Column.name: AllowFullCityColonists
Column.notes: Special ability: Colonists units cost X% more production but found cities immediately

Column.name: FullCityColonistCostMod
Column.notes: Cost mod associated with AllowFullCityColonists

Column.name: UnitFreePromotion
Column.notes: All current and future Units receive this Unit Promotion

Column.name: NonsentientAlienVisionRangeChange
Column.notes: Changes the visibility range from nonsentient alien units (ie. hydracoral), which is -1 (no vision) by default. A value of 1 will change the overall range to 0, granting vision on the unit's occupied tile. A value of 2 will change the overall range to 1, granting vision of adjacent tiles as well, etc.

Column.name: AllowCitizensWorkingNonsentientAlienTiles
Column.notes: Allows the player's cities to work tiles occupied by nonsentient alien units (ie. hydracoral).

Column.name: CityRangedDefenseMod
Column.notes: Reduces ranged damage taken by the city by this percent

Column.name: CityEnemyAttritionRange
Column.notes: Enemy units within this range to the city will suffer standard attrition damage

Column.name: CityAlienUnitConstruction
Column.notes: Allows the city to construct Alien units

Column.name: CityBuildingsMaintenanceMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the city's total maintenance cost for all its buildings

Column.name: CityImprovementsMaintenanceMod
Column.notes: Percent change to the city's total maintenance cost for all its improvements

Column.name: LaunchedOrbitalUnitOverlapChange
Column.notes: Change to the amount of coverage overlap allowed to orbital units launched from this city

Column.name: ShallowWaterProduction
Column.notes: Flat change to Production Yield from Shallow (Coast) plots worked by this city

Column.name: ShallowWaterScience
Column.notes: Flat change to Science Yield from Shallow (Coast) plots worked by this city

Column.name: VirtueCostModPerPopulation
Column.notes: Percent change to global Culture cost for Virtues based on the city's population

Column.name: CapitalOnly
Column.notes: Indicates the effect will only apply to the Capital city (overrides Common flag)
